name: Ryuku: Extinction
description:
Ryuku is a game about destroying spacecraft as a fire-breathing mythical dragon. As ships are destroyed Ryuku absorbs the explosions to become more powerful. Featuring an intro cut-scene,  an outro cut-scene,  deep lore, a tutorial, a 3 song soundtrack and 1 level to play on, Ryuku: Extinction is a game you don't wanna miss. Play now for the low low price of zero dollars and zero cents.

Tip: if you're not finding good stuff to attack, just keep moving, stuff spawns on the edge of the map as you move around.
